contentencoded: Kai looks back on this week, chatting with Linette Lopez from Business Insider and the Wall Street Journal’s Sudeep Reddy about the world economy and the spending power of the American consumer.
teaser: Kai discusses the week that was.
title: Do consumers have to shop to save the economy?
description: Kai discusses the week that was.
